DescriptionData.Title: Magnetic Dart Board Safe Easy to Use Double-Sided Darts Protective Hanging Dart Board Set Parent-Child Game Accessories for Kids Fun Game 15-inch
DescriptionData.Description:
Features:
1. Magnetic darts, safe and practical, darts can be rolled up, lanyard, can be played anywhere, and there are beautifully printed rectangular boxes, easy to carry, good tools for fitness and leisure. It replaces the unsafeness of the needle in front of the original dart, and there is no dart tip, which will not hurt people.
2. Eye-catching design can relieve eye fatigue and exercise vision, great for people who sitting in front of a computer for a long time.
3. Parent and children connections are vital to family development. The dart board games are a perfect way to strengthen these connections.
4. Because we need to calculate our score during the process of playing darts, it is a good math teacher develop the children's intelligence.
5. It is also a great leisure activities for the people that sedentary in the office. Make you relex during work.

Parameter:
Name: Double-sided Magnetic Dart Target
Style: positive and negative competition / casual
Material: flannel, PVC
Color: black, color
Size: about 43.5cm x 37 cm/17.13*14.57in
Weight: about 650g
Recommend age: above 6 years old

List:
6*Magnetic darts
1*Double-sided magnetic dart target
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: ★Portable and Durable Board Games: We can roll up it easily because it is made of the flannel. Enjoy the fun of all the same characteristics of traditional dartboard, but no worried about hurting kids or walls.Adults can use it to relieve stress when they are tired.
